item.title: Adani Group slams 'baseless' New York fraud and bribery charges
item.description: India's Adani Group has denied allegations of bribery and fraud made by U.S. authorities in relation to the group's chair Gautam Adani.

item.title: AI systems could 'turn against humans': Tech pioneer Yoshua Bengio warns of artificial intelligence risks
item.description: There is a "fringe" who might be happy to see humanity replaced by machines according to tech pioneer Yoshua Bengio.

item.title: Britainâ€™s 'mini-budget' disaster should serve as a warning to the U.S., bond strategists say
item.description: Fears are mounting that the U.S. could soon experience its own version of Britain's "mini-budget" crisis.

item.title: Adani Group shares nosedive after chairman Gautam Adani charged with fraud in New York
item.description: Shares of India's Adani Group companies plunged after its billionaire chair Gautam Adani was indicted in a New York federal court.

item.title: FBI arrests homeless Florida man in alleged plot to bomb the New York Stock Exchange
item.description: Harun Abdul-Malik Yener made a series of audio recordings to be sent to NBC News around the time of the planned bombing, the complaint says.
